QuestData.Title: Ordnance Disposal
QuestData.Description: If the Grand Empress's agents are still operating under security standards from my time, they would have hidden powerful pheromone mines all around the clutches.$B$BWith mere whisper she could detonate them all simultaneously, engulfing the palace and rendering entire siege armies powerless.$B$BIf we hope to have any success in a large scale standoff, we need to disable those mines. My... "gift" to you when we met will allow you to see the mines. Disturb them and get to a safe distance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Disable 8 Pheromone Mines around the Clutches of Shek'zeer and the Heart of Fear.
